title: Getting to grips with Open Data platforms
displayTitle: Getting to grips with Open Data platforms
body:
Data publishing platforms have proliferated over the past few years. This module helps publishers understand the evolution of these platforms and the reasons for their development. This will help inform the users choice on which platform to choose and how to make best use of each platformâ€™s capabilities in their own environments.

Learning objectives
  • To enable users to understand the pros and cons of open data publishing platforms and their capabilities.
